overview: "Live and Kickin" features Travis Tritt live in concert at the historic Tivoli theatre in downtown Chatanooga, Tennesse. The show, filmed in 2004, features many of Travis' all-time greatest hits, including eight top ten singles, and powerful acoustic performances of "Anymore", Country ain't country" and "Long haired country boy" , a recording never before available from Travis.
title: Travis Tritt - Live and Kickin'
